sentences.en: But, on the other hand, as our standards of life skyrocket, so do our expectations.
sentences.cn: 但是另一方面, 我们生活的标准和我们的期望越来越高.

sentences.en: Christmas sales attract many visitors; hotel prices skyrocket, especially on weekends.
sentences.cn: 圣诞节的销售,吸引很多游客, 酒店价格飞涨, 尤其是在周末.

sentences.en: Do you curse? Does your pressure skyrocket? Do you try and bump them?
sentences.cn: 你会怒骂 吗 ?你的血压是否急速上升? 你会否尝试去碰击他们?
你的血压是否急速上升?

sentences.en: Does your blood pressure skyrocket? Do you try and bump them?
sentences.cn: 你的血压是否急速上升? 你会否尝试去?击他们?

sentences.en: I saw the skyrocket last night.
sentences.cn: 我昨夜看到了流星火焰.

sentences.en: It's no wonder suicide rates skyrocket this time of year.
sentences.cn: 怪不得每年这个时候的自杀率都攀升啊.

sentences.en: Its currency would skyrocket -- meaning the loss of its competitive low - cost - producer edge . Or , U.
sentences.cn: 人民必将会暴涨,这就意味着失去了 低成本 生产者的比较优势.
贸易逆差已经急剧增长。

sentences.en: This success is paying economic dividends as oil prices skyrocket.
sentences.cn: 当这石油价格飞速上涨的时候,这个成功取得了巨大的经济利益.

trans.tran_en: if a price or an amount skyrockets, it greatly increases very quickly
